CastleTower - Class in code.game.models
Castle tower extends the tower model class and is a a type of tower available in the game

changeStrategyOfTower() - Method in class code.game.controllers.SingleGameController
Shows a dialog containing the list of all the available strategies for the tower being placed on the map.

Critter - Class in code.game.models
